sentences.en: Every square metre of soil was used, mainly for olives, vines, and almonds.
sentences.cn: 每一平方米的土壤都用上了，主要是种植橄榄、葡萄藤和杏树。

sentences.en: Hearn fastened the vine about his belt, and stepped out into the rapids.
sentences.cn: 俟思把藤索在腰里系好, 闯进激流.

sentences.en: I heard on the grape - vine that Jill is to be promoted.
sentences.cn: 我听人说吉尔就要提升了.

sentences.en: I'm going to try to train the vine along the east wall of the garden.
sentences.cn: 我要设法让这条藤蔓顺着院子的东墙生长.

sentences.en: Ivy is a type of vine.
sentences.cn: 常青藤是一种藤本植物。

sentences.en: The easiest way to propagate a vine is to take hardwood cuttings.
sentences.cn: 栽培葡萄最简便的方法就是硬条扦插。

sentences.en: The grape - vine creeps along the wall.
The grape vine climbed up along the wall.
The grapes are growing well on the vine.
sentences.cn: 葡萄在藤上长得十分好.

sentences.en: The vine growers killed the sheep of the dwellers in the hills.
sentences.cn: 种葡萄的人杀死了山里人的羊.

sentences.en: The vine has begun to grow away from the wall.
sentences.cn: 葡萄树已开始伸向墙外了.

sentences.en: The vine twines around the tree.
sentences.cn: 这根藤盘绕在那棵树上.

sentences.en: The vine twines round the tree.
Then we ate pinot grapes right off the vine.
sentences.cn: 我们还从葡萄藤上摘了皮诺葡萄吃.

sentences.en: There they looked out of the window at the ivy vine.
sentences.cn: 他们在那儿看着窗外的常春藤蔓.

sentences.en: Vine and olive growers were protected by tariffs against cheap imports of wine and olive oil.
sentences.cn: 希腊以提高关税来抑制廉价进口葡萄酒和橄榄油,从而保护葡萄和橄榄种植者的利益.

words.tran_cn: 葡萄酒酿造学；[园艺] 葡萄栽培法
藤；[园艺]葡萄树；[植]藤本植物；攀缘植物

trans.tran_en: a plant with long thin stems that attach themselves to other plants, trees, buildings etc
